text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
author: Sabbir Hossen

text: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad.
author: Cory House

text: You should get married by looking at the face, Almost everyone has a bad character
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

text: Don't compare yourself with others. Compare yourself with who you were yesterday.
author: Jordan Peterson

text: Simplicity is about subtracting the obvious and adding the meaningful.
author: John Maeda

text: If you’re not embarrassed by the first version of your product, you shipped too late.
author: Reid Hoffman
